title: Frequently Asked Questions
ctaTitle: Didn't find what you were looking for?

items.question: What is Industry 4.0?
items.answer: It is the digital transformation of industrial processes using technologies like IoT, AI, automation, and data analytics.

items.question: What services do you offer as a consultancy?
items.answer: We provide diagnostics, custom solutions, tech implementation, and training to digitize your industry.

items.question: Do you work with small companies or only large factories?
items.answer: We work with businesses of all sizes. Our solutions are scalable and adaptable to each reality.

items.question: Can I request a demo or consultation with no obligation?
items.answer: Yes. You can schedule a meeting to discuss your needs and see how we can help.
